articles.description: A new report from analyst Ming-Chi Kuo suggests Apple could be going "all in" on Mini-LEDs a lot sooner than planned.
articles.content:
Now that the transition to Apple Silicon is well underway, it seems like Apple could be gearing up for a rapid shift to mini-LED displays too.
Mini-LEDs are an upgrade on current LED backlighting in… [+2367 chars]

articles.title: Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 is 2021’s flagship Android processor, 25% better performance [U] - 9to5Google
articles.description: Qualcomm has just announced the Snapdragon 888, it's latest high-end processor which will be used in next year's high-end Android phones.
articles.content: Qualcomm is the name of the game when it comes to high-end Android smartphones, and today we’re getting the first details on what’s next. For 2021, the processor we’ll see in many major Android phone… [+2699 chars]
